title: I own riot Kayle however i havent recieve mystery skin yet whats happening ??
body: Hello i own riot {{champion:10}} however i still haven't receive mystery skin yet may someone resolve this issue please ?

replies.body: I received the 10 year anniversary icon, yet I still remain to receive Riot Kayle. I have noted that the support banner indicating that the delivery was still in process has been deleted, thus, I'll probably send a support ticket to see what was the problem. I'll also mention that the rest of the times I was entitled to a gift by Riot, I had to ask for it in a support ticket after the delivery time expired. They kindly provided me with it without issues, but makes me wonder if there are some problems to reach certain people accounts in the gifting procedure.
Riot said, it was taking a bit longer than normal to hand out the skins. If it still does not show up in due time, Just message them on riot support to see whats happening.

We're aiming to have all the gifts done today, but it's not over just yet per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  There's still some time remaining over, so hang tight!  Don't worry, you'll get your goodies!
